Interlocutors are the most talented surgeon-sculptors of the velstracs, carving away flesh and replacing it with new body parts of muscle, sinew, and metal. Each interlocutor structures their individual appearance carefully, but all are towering, multi-limbed amalgamations of the strongest limbs, densest bone, and sharpest metal they can find. They continually search for new material to graft to their forms, and their slain foes are rarely found intact, as little is more valuable to interlocutors than a powerful opponent's legs, eyes, or even brain. Interlocutors average 9 feet tall and weigh approximately 800 pounds. **[Recall Knowledge - Fiend](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 30 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 28 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 25 [Interlocutor](/Monsters.aspx?ID=851) **Source** [Bestiary 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=32) pg. 285 2.0, [Pathfinder #147: Tomorrow Must Burn](/Sources.aspx?ID=8) pg. 84 **Perception** +24; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), painsight **Languages** [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Infernal](/Languages.aspx?ID=19), [Shadowtongue](/Languages.aspx?ID=21) **Skills** [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +25, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +22, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +25, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +26, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +22, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +19, [Torture Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +20 **Str** +7 **Dex** +3 **Con** +5 **Int** +2 **Wis** +6 **Cha** +5 **Painsight** ([divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48)) A velstrac automatically knows whether a creature it sees has any of the [doomed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=9), [dying](/Conditions.aspx?ID=11), and [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) conditions, as well as the value of those conditions. --- **AC** 33 **Fort** +23 **Ref** +21 **Will** +26 +1 status to all saves vs. magic **HP** 215 , regeneration 20 (deactivated by good or silver) **Immunities** cold **Weaknesses** good 15, silver 15 **Glimpse of Stolen Flesh** ([aura](/Traits.aspx?ID=206), [divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) 30 feet. When a creature ends its turn in the aura, it sees pieces of its own body amid the interlocutor's form. The creature must succeed at a DC 29 Will save or become [stunned 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36).
**[Attack of Opportunity](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=3)** --- **Speed** 40 feet **Melee** claw +25 ([deadly 2d10](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [Evil](/Traits.aspx?ID=64), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)), **Damage** 3d10+13 slashing plus 2d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) **Divine Innate Spells** DC 33 - **Cantrips (6th)** [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **4th** [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) (×2), [Restoration](/Spells.aspx?ID=258) (×2) - **5th** [Breath of Life](/Spells.aspx?ID=29) - **7th** [Plane Shift](/Spells.aspx?ID=222) (self only; to the Material Plane or [Shadow Plane](/Planes.aspx?ID=11) only) **Focus Gaze** ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) The interlocutor stares at a creature they can see within 30 feet. The creature must immediately attempt a Will save against Glimpse of Stolen Flesh. In addition, if the creature was already [stunned](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36), on a failed save, it feels its internal organs twist and writhe, and is [clumsy 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=3) for 1 minute. After attempting this save, the creature is then temporarily immune until the start of the interlocutor's next turn. **Surgical Rend** This functions as the [Rend](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=30) ability, dealing claw damage. In addition, if the target is a living creature with organs and muscle, the interlocutor opens a precise wound. Until the creature is restored to its maximum Hit Points, thus closing the wound, Strikes against the creature deal 1d6 extra precision damage.
name: Interlocutor
